frame.name: Retro Snake Game
frame.subtitle: Classic Snake game for Farcaster
frame.description: Play the classic Snake game directly in Farcaster! Control the snake to eat food, grow longer, and compete for high scores. Features progressive difficulty, mobile touch controls, and the ability to share your scores on Warpcast. Challenge your friends and see who can reach the highest level!

metadata.name: Retro Snake Game
metadata.description: Classic Snake game for Farcaster with high scores and social sharing
metadata.author: Your Name
